content:
Hi,

Does anyone have any advice on what would be a sensible system URI for AWS account identifiers? We would like to use these globally unique identifiers as part of our AuditEvent agent, however we're not sure how to best define this as an AuditEvent.agent.

Thanks
Oh I should have clarified, these are ARN's and they are globally unique over all of AWS
You could submit a change proposal and we could define a standard one...
